summary: **Swan Lake** is a famous ballet composed by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky in 1875-76. Though it didn't do well at first, it's now a favorite worldwide. The story, inspired by Russian and German folktales, is about Princess Odette, turned into a swan by an evil sorcerer. First performed in Moscow in 1877, the ballet is mostly staged today based on a 1895 revival by Marius Petipa and Lev Ivanov. The music was updated for this version by Riccardo Drigo.
title: Swan Lake
